author: cutting
msg: HADOOP-1324.  Change so that an FSError kills only the task that generates it rather than the entire task tracker.  Contributed by Arun.

author: cutting
msg: HADOOP-1252.  Changed MapReduce's allocation of local files to use round-robin among configured devices, rather than a hashcode, also improving error handling.  Contributed by Devaraj.
